title: Replace logo with user-uploaded design

requirements.text: Replace the circular winged logo image in the Header component (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]) with the user-uploaded logo design showing the KARTHIKEYAN BIKE SHOWROOM branding with winged emblem and silver metallic styling
acceptanceCriteria: The Header component displays the new logo image from the uploaded files
The logo maintains its circular shape and responsive sizing
The logo is clickable and maintains existing navigation behavior
The visual style matches the uploaded design with silver/metallic finish on black background

requirements.text: Update any logo references in the selected page elements (XPaths: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2], /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1], /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1]) to use the new uploaded logo design if they reference the logo image
acceptanceCriteria: All selected elements that reference the logo image are updated to use the new design
Visual consistency is maintained across all logo instances
No broken image references remain in the selected elements

constraints: Preserve existing Header component structure and functionality
Maintain responsive design and circular logo shape
nonGoals: Altering other visual elements beyond the logo

required: Circular logo with winged emblem, KARTHIKEYAN BIKE SHOWROOM text, silver metallic styling on black background with chrome border (karthikeyan-logo.dim_200x200.png)
